with full round-trip testing strategy using mocks.

EOF
\)")

- IDE: .vscode/, .idea/
- OS: .DS_Store, Thumbs.db

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update Python requirement to >=3.13 for ChromaDB compatibility

ChromaDB 1.4.1 uses Pydantic v1 which is incompatible with Python 3.14+.
Updated workspace and all member projects to require Python >=3.13.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add Phase 3 Document Formats design

Design for PDF and Markdown chunking with advanced structure
preservation for scientific literature.

- PDF: tables, figures, page numbers, multi-column layouts
- Markdown: section-aware chunking with heading paths
- Fallback: plain text for unsupported formats

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

feat: add pdfplumber dependency for PDF parsing

Bash(uv run python -c "import re; text = ''This is a paragraph.\\nFigure 1: A nice diagram\\nAnother paragraph.''; pattern = r''Figure\\s+\\d+[:.]?\\s+[^\\n]+''; print\(re.findall\(pattern, text, re.IGNORECASE\)\)")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add PDFChunker class with basic extraction")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add PDFChunker class with basic extraction

Implemented PDFChunker class for extracting and chunking PDF files
with structure preservation for scientific literature.

Features:
- Page-by-page chunking with metadata
- Figure caption extraction from text
- Table data extraction
- Metadata includes: source, chunk_index, page_number,
  section_title, figure_captions, table_data

Tests: 11 tests passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add PDFChunker class with structure preservation

- Extract and chunk PDF files using pdfplumber
- Preserve metadata: source, chunk_index, page_number, section_title,
  figure_captions, table_data
- Extract figure captions with regex patterns for "Figure X:" and "Fig. X"
- Extract table data from PDF pages
- Chunk by page \(simple implementation for MVP\)

Tests:
- 11 tests covering file not found, basic chunking, multiple pages,
  empty text handling, tables, absolute paths, figure caption extraction

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add MarkdownChunker class with section-aware splitting")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add MarkdownChunker class with section-aware splitting

Implements MarkdownChunker that:
- Splits Markdown documents by H1-H3 headings
- Preserves heading hierarchy in metadata \(heading_path\)
- Supports nested section structure tracking
- Handles edge cases: empty sections, content before first heading
- 15 comprehensive tests all passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
